titles.title: Stop Silencing Victims Act
Stop Silencing Victims Act
A bill to establish that certain provisions of a nondisclosure agreement between a public sector employer and an employee shall be unenforceable.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Stop Silencing Victims Act
This bill makes unenforceable any provision of a nondisclosure agreement between a public sector employer and an employee that prohibits the disclosure of information relating to an allegation or a series of allegations that could give rise to a valid claim of sex discrimination.
